attributes.review: this app was HORRIBLE. i downloaded it and it crashed my whole phone with pictures of shane yaw. don’t even get me started on how it gave out my number to creepy old men trying to get my feet pictures. and when i played music with the app on my phone, it started to play horrible crying noises and it was crying “please daddy no” LIKE WHAT ???? goodbye this app is NOT WORTH IT 😿✨😩
attributes.title: horrible app 😿😿

attributes.review: omg #awful app😔 i really wanted to support my orange cheeto legend with this app but right when i clicked install a bunch of flying oranges came at me😿😿 so i ran upstairs and there was cheeto man soldiers the ninja kicked me in the face🙀😮✨🙈i just couldn’t take this. then when i pressed that they could send me notifications i got sucked into a black hole! only it was orange and there were mini tr*mps wearing diapers everywhere i was trying so hard not to step on them😿😿😿😿, scariest day of my life, i swear i didn’t think i’d make it🥺🥺✨💗. of course i will always support my orange bb🥰🥰😿😽 but what i went through today scared me for life😿😿😿thank you.

Slow, it always freezes and then pulls me out of the app. The content within the app is completely inappropriate for children women, anybody who’s not a white male. If I can rate is zero stars I would because this app is just horrible, and Apple should really think twice about letting people put these kinds of apps in the store.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app has sent me non stop messages and when I turned off the notifications the app go so overwhelmed with all the trump updates that it crashed and then I noticed that I was having issues with my phone after this. My phone would randomly open to the app and it became a huge Issue. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: Destroyed my phone

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!! When I went to download the app my phone started glitching and overheating and ended up locking me out of my phone! I took it to the store to see if it could be fixed and the workers there warned me my phone contracted corona from downloading this app and now i have to quarantine for at least two weeks with a diseased phone!!!!
attributes.title: Have my phone corona virus!!!!

attributes.review: When I downloaded it it took forever and I have good WiFi so that’s one problem and whenever I load on it glitches out when I put my phone number it tells me to do it again when I do it right and same thing with my email which is just awful I hate this app and TikTok lives matter
attributes.title: Omg worst thing ever

attributes.review: where do i even start! this app took 8 hours to download and i have fine wifi while it was downloading i couldn’t do anything on my phone and if i did it made the app take longer to download! the app is made so horribly it makes my phone break every time i go on it. Trump 2020 but on a tombstone
attributes.title: never get this app

attributes.review: This is the worst app to ever ever ever be created especially by the orange 🍊it gave my phone a virus and had to get a brand new one then it was stuck on my phone and I couldn’t delete it until finally I went to the App Store and contacted them and they got it removed. Over all don’t get this app it’s trash just like our president 🤮🤢
attributes.title: Worst app to ever exists

attributes.review: Once i clicked on the app everything glitched so bad i had to restart my phone. When it turned on every app was deleted and so was everything from my gallery! After a while Black lives matter and Pride flags started popping everywhere on the screen! Guess even my phone doesnt want to deal with this app!
attributes.title: Terrible app!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support out our donkey president. The app took a long period of time to download and it was the worst. This app has stolen all of my information and I do not feel very comfortable with it. Ugh and it has adsssssss 😒 I didn’t download it to see ads. Anyways this app should be deleted from the Apple store, if not I’m going to be very disappointed
attributes.title: HATE ITTTTT
